name: Light Halo
description:
WARNING: if Windows warn you about the file, just click: more information > execute.

This game is a Jam game they might be some bugs if so press R to restart the level.

-V 0.0.1 Release

-V 0.0.2 Minor Bug Fix (Thank's to the beta testers)

Josh is just about to become a "Light Halo" the best people of the civilisation!

But for that he need to pass the test prepared by the greatest "Light Halo", but, he changed the rules for every levels! Sooo... be carefull to read them all at the begining of the puzzle...

Those puzzle are the hardest of the entire galaxy and nobody will care if you die...

There is a few blocks:

-Walls:

can be passed through if the rule n°1 is not active.

-Slab:

can be crouched under if the rule 4 is active but not passed through.

-Cubes:

can be pushed if the rule 5 is active

-Spikes:

are always deadly!

-The Flag

when you touch this that mean your pain is over! For a sec....

This game was made in 48Hours during the United Game Jam. All the musics/sprites/code/ect... were made during this 48hours period.

The theme was: TWO. And could be used like we wanted so:

2 Colors.

2 Rules of the 5 are always off.

Hope you'll ENJOY!  ^-^
